text.jpText:
ライスシャワーは、また迷惑をかけて
しまうので、チームを辞めると言う。
それ以来、トレーニングにも来なくなる。
text.enText:
Rice Shower says she is going to quit the 
team because she is going to get in trouble 
again. Since then, she doesn't come to 
training anymore.

text.jpText:
これを機に、他のメンバーたちは、今まで
チームの和を乱さないために、自分を
抑えていたことが間違いだと気づく。
text.enText:
The other members of the team realize that 
they have been holding themselves back in 
order not to disrupt the harmony of the team, 
and that this was a mistake. They realized 
that they had been suppressing themselves in 
order not to disturb the harmony of the team, 
and that this was a mistake.

text.jpText:
ライスシャワーを説得していると、
マチカネフクキタルが、占いで今から浜辺に
行くとラッキーだと言い出す。
text.enText:
While trying to convince Rice Shower, 
Machikanefukukkitar tells her that she 
will be lucky if she goes to the beach 
now by fortune-telling. Machikanefukukkitaru 
says that it is lucky to go to the beach 
from now on.

text.jpText:
ライスシャワーが正論で止めると、
ストッパー役として必要な存在と賞される。
自信を取り戻し、彼女は立ち直るのだった。
text.enText:
When Rice Shower stops her with a good 
argument, she is awarded a much-needed 
stopper role. Confidence restored, she gets 
back on her feet.
